大西洋戦域各方面において\n深海勢力が侵食しないよう\n各港湾の警備と制圧を実施: In various sectors of the Atlantic theater, prevent abyssal forces from invading. Enfore security and control of each port. Fleet, sortie!
艦隊を地中海方面に展開！\n北アフリカの要港オラン港\n方面の潜在敵艦隊を奇襲、: Deploy a fleet to the Mediterranean area! Launch a surprise attack on the potential enemy fleet in the key port of Oran in North Africa and neutralize them!
大西洋方面の艦隊戦力を結\n集、フリータウンへ展開！\n同地よりダカールの敵勢力: Concentrate fleet forces in the Atlantic region and deploy to Freetown! From there, launch a strong assault on the enemy forces in Dakar and annihilate them!
太平洋南部/ダバオ沖/ビアク島沖: Southern Pacific / Off Davao / Off Biak Island
太平洋南部戦域への敵侵攻\n艦隊を捕捉、タウイタウイ\nからの増援により、これを: Intercept the enemy invasion fleet in the Southern Pacific theater and annihilate it with reinforcements from Tawi-Tawi! Fleet, sortie!
第二次珊瑚海海戦: Second Battle of the Coral Sea
太平洋戦域の反攻作戦、新\nMO作戦を実施する！\n我が精鋭機動部隊、出撃！\n: Commence a counteroffensive in the Pacific theater, the new MO Operation! Our elite mobile fleet, sortie! Carve victory over dawn's horizon!
カタパルト作戦、発動！\n欧州要港の潜在深海戦力を無力化せよ！:
Launching Operation Catapult! Neutralise
potential Abyssals in key European ports!
Force H 地中海に出撃！ オラン港方面へ展開！\n潜在脅威を無力化、カタパ:
Force H, sortie to the Mediterranean Sea!
Deployment towards Oran! Neutralise threats
     and complete Operation Catapult.
Operation Menace 発動！\nダカール港の潜在敵戦力を無力化せよ！:
Operation Menace launched!
Neutralise enemy threats in the port of Dakar!
ビアク島救援の前線航空基地となるソロンへの\n兵站輸送作戦を敢行する！ 艦隊、警:
We're carrying out a transport mission to
Sorong, where the forward airbase for the relief
     of Biak Island will be! Fleet, remain vigilant!
連合艦隊主力、タウイタウイ泊地を抜錨ッ！\nビアク島方面の救援を実施する！ 対潜:
Combined Fleet Main Force, weigh anchor
from Tawi-Tawi! Carry out the relief operation
     for Biak Island! Maintain anti-sub vigilance.
敵勢力圏内に突入する！ 対艦戦闘用意ッ！\n艦隊、増速！ 我に続け！:
We are entering enemy-controlled waters!
Prepare for anti-ship combat! Fleet,
     increase speed! Follow me!
MO機動部隊、出撃！珊瑚海方面に進出する。\n対潜、対空警戒を厳とせよッ！:
MO Mobile Fleet, sortie! Advance towards
the Coral Sea area. Maintain strict
     anti-submarine and anti-air vigilance!
MO機動部隊、全艦隊戦闘用意ッ！\n敵機動部隊を捕捉、これを撃滅する！:
MO Mobile Fleet, prepare all fleets for
battle! Intercept the enemy mobile force
     and annihilate them!
